meeting_info.organization: Maple/Mockingbird TIF District Board of Directors
meeting_info.location: Dallas City Hall, 6DN Conference Room and Videoconference

agenda_items.title: Call meeting to order and declare a quorum is established.
Public comments pertaining to agenda items 4 through 6.
Review and consider the Meeting Record of the December 21, 2023 meeting.
agenda_items.description: Review and consider the Meeting Record of the December 21, 2023 meeting of the Maple/Mockingbird TIF District Board of Directors.

agenda_items.title: Review and consider the Maple/Mockingbird TIF District Annual Report for FY 2023-2024.
agenda_items.description: Review and consider the Maple/Mockingbird TIF District Annual Report for FY 2023-2024.
agenda_items.action_required: Approve and forward a recommendation of approval to City Council

agenda_items.title: Review and consider a regular meeting schedule for the Maple/Mockingbird TIF District Board of Directors for calendar year 2025.
